attributes.action: grant a petition (previously submitted) on this website to create a new public holiday: "International Talk Like a Pirate Day" annually, on or about 19th September.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Your objection to my petition was:
"* Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy"
Clearly a petition to instate a new public holiday DOES have have a point about government policy.
I therefore conclude that the main objection is:
"Intended to be humorous"
My contention is:
How can you know my intent, humorous or not?
You can't can you?
You can't read my mind.
You can't read my thoughts.
You can not know my intent.
Therefore you must grant me my petition.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
